lyric:
[00:19.06]I need more dreams
[00:21.11]And less life
[00:25.40]And I need that dark
[00:28.27]In a little more light
[00:32.25]I cried tears you’ll never see
[00:38.77]So **** you, you can go cry me an ocean
[00:42.24]And leave me be
[00:44.73]
[00:45.11]You are what you love
[00:48.89]Not who loves you
[00:51.82]In a world full of the word yes
[00:55.72]I’m here to scream
[00:58.78]
[00:58.95]No
[01:01.25]Wherever I go
[01:04.86]Trouble seems to follow
[01:07.70]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[01:11.39]Wherever I go
[01:17.42]Trouble seems to follow
[01:21.39]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[01:25.86]
[01:38.11]Blood brothers in desperation
[01:43.94]An oath of silence
[01:46.69]For the voice of our generation
[01:51.11]How’d it get to be only me?
[01:58.49]Like I’m the last damn kid still kicking
[02:01.23]That still believes
[02:04.21]
[02:04.52]I will defend the faith
[02:08.18]Going down swinging
[02:10.79]I will save the songs
[02:14.51]That we can't stop singing
[02:17.31]
[02:18.25]No
[02:20.30]Wherever I go
[02:23.58]Trouble seems to follow
[02:26.88]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[02:30.98]Wherever I go
[02:37.13]Trouble seems to follow
[02:40.41]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[02:45.32]Oh no we won’t go
[02:48.49]Cause we don’t know when to quit
[02:51.51]Oh no we won’t go
[02:54.86]Cause we don’t know when to quit
[02:58.03]Oh no we won’t go
[03:01.20]Cause we don’t know when to quit
[03:04.68]Oh no we won’t go
[03:07.91]Cause we don’t know when to quit
[03:10.64]
[03:11.22]You are what you love
[03:14.38]Not who loves you
[03:16.80]In a world full of the word yes
[03:21.15]I’m here to scream
[03:23.89]
[03:24.59]No
[03:26.83]Wherever I go
[03:29.75]Trouble seems to follow
[03:32.79]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[03:37.64]No
[03:40.25]Wherever I go
[03:42.98]Trouble seems to follow
[03:45.70]Only plugged in to save rock and roll
[03:50.54]
[03:50.72]Oh no we won’t go Cause we don’t know when to quit
tlyric:
[by:ZPPo丶]
[00:19.06]我需要追逐梦想
[00:21.11]远离浮世
[00:25.40]我需要沉默黑暗
[00:28.27]远离微光
[00:32.25]你不会看见我哭泣
[00:38.77]去你的 ，你可以离开，让我泪流成海
[00:42.24]留下我一人
[00:45.11]你应为你爱之人
[00:48.89]绝非爱你之人
[00:51.82]在言语充斥的世界里
[00:55.72]我在这里呐喊
[00:58.95]不，不
[01:01.25]不管我去哪
[01:04.86]苦难随行
[01:07.70]只有跟上摇滚不息
[01:11.39]不管我去哪
[01:17.42]苦难随行
[01:21.39]只有跟上摇滚不死
[01:38.11]绝望中热血沸腾
[01:43.94]一个无言的宣誓
[01:46.69]为了这一代而呐喊
[01:51.11]岂独我一人？
[01:58.49]就像我是唯一一个捣蛋的孩子
[02:01.23]仍然相信
[02:04.52]我会捍卫信念
[02:08.18]继续摇滚
[02:10.79]我会继续高歌
[02:14.51]我们不能停止歌唱
[02:18.25]不，不
[02:20.30]不管我去哪
[02:23.58]困难总是跟随
[02:26.88]只有跟上摇滚不息
[02:30.98]不管我去哪
[02:37.13]困难总是跟随
[02:40.41]只有跟上摇滚不死
[02:45.32]哦不，我们不会离开
[02:48.49]我们不知道何时该放弃，哦哦
[02:51.51]哦不，我们不会离开
[02:54.86]我们不知道何时该放弃，哦哦
[02:58.03]哦不，我们不会离开
[03:01.20]我们不知道何时该放弃，哦哦
[03:04.68]哦不，我们不会离开
[03:07.91]我们不知道何时该放弃，哦哦

[03:14.38]绝非爱你之人

[03:21.15]我在这里呐喊
